name: CandyTv
description: Stream Live IPTV, Video On-Demand, and Series from an Xtream-compatible server using this plugin.
overview: Stream content from an Xtream-compatible server.

versions.changelog: Fixed icon filename case-sensitivity issue. Icon file now CandyTV.png (capital V) to match repository imageUrl filename.
Renamed icon file to CandyTv.png (matching plugin name). Removed meta.json from ZIP - Jellyfin generates it automatically during installation.
Fixed icon display with correct relative imagePath in meta.json. Changed from GitHub URL to relative path 'thumb.png'.
Fixed plugin icon display by removing conflicting API controller and adding meta.json with ImagePath. Icon now served by Jellyfin's built-in endpoint.

Fixed plugin icon display with dedicated API endpoint. Implements /Plugins/{pluginId}/{version}/Image endpoint that Jellyfin uses to load icons. Triple fallback: GitHub URL, embedded resource, file system. Resolves 404 Not Found on icon requests.

Icon loading from GitHub URL. Primary method loads icon directly from GitHub (same URL as catalog). Triple fallback: GitHub URL, embedded resource, file system. Should fix persistent icon disappearing after restart.
Enhanced icon loading with dual fallback mechanism. Tries embedded resource first, then file system. Better error handling and detailed logging to identify icon loading issues.
Final icon display fix. thumb.png now automatically copied to plugin directory during build. Icon file always present alongside DLL. Fixes persistent broken icon issue after restart.
Improved icon loading with debug logging. Enhanced GetThumbImage() method with resource validation and fallback mechanisms. Fixes broken icon display in My Plugins page.

Add plugin icon support for My Plugins page. Icon now displays both in catalog and installed plugins list. Complete ZIP package with all dependencies (Diacritics.dll, FuzzySharp.dll, ICU4N.dll, ICU4N.Transliterator.dll, J2N.dll, Newtonsoft.Json.dll) and thumb.png icon file.
Initial public release with Live TV, VOD, Series, and Catchup support. EPG caching, custom channel lists, thumbnail caching, and connection queue management.
